pkgmetadata.longdescription: Biological Risk Assessment // A spatio-temporal exposure-hazard model for assessing biological risk and impact. The model is based on stochastic geometry for describing the landscape and the exposed individuals, a dispersal kernel for the dissemination of contaminants and an ecotoxicological equation. Walker E, Leclerc M, Rey JF, Beaudouin R, Soubeyrand S, and Messean A, (2017), A Spatio-Temporal Exposure-Hazard Model for Assessing Biological Risk and Impact, Risk Analysis, doi:10.1111/risa.12941.
